thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian's Daughter, Penelope, Ranks Her Aunts in Hilarious Video — Find Out Who Is the ‘Friendliest’!
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian's Daughter, Penelope, Ranks Her Aunts in Hilarious Video — Find Out Who Is the ‘Friendliest’!

title: Kourtney Kardashian's Daughter, Penelope, Ranks Her Aunts in Hilarious Video — Find Out Who Is the ‘Friendliest’!
text:
Kardashian Family Album 
“Kiki is the nicest and friendliest,” Disick, 33, can be heard repeating back to his daughter in the Snapchat, before Kim, 36, interjects: "That’s what you said, P? And Koko is the craziest with the biggest butt in the whole family?” 
“She does have the biggest butt,” Kim adds before panning to her sister Khloé’s derriere. Kim Kardashian, Kourtney Kardashian and Khloe Kardashian surprise military moms-to-be with gifts, including items from their Kardashian Kids collection, at an Operation Shower event at Battello on July 7, 2014 in Jersey City, New Jersey. Kevin Mazur/Getty Images 
Kourtney, 37, also posted a sweet photo reading to her little girl on Instagram on Friday, March 3, and took to her blog to reveal the bedtime routine that works for her. 
“Having a bedtime routine works really well in our house,” the mom of three shared. “I try to always be there to do bedtime, no matter how busy my day is. Ending our day together and praying before we go to sleep is a big part of our routine.” A post shared by Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) on Mar 2, 2017 at 1:26pm PST 
As she tucks her kids into bed, Kourtney shared that she reads books to Penelope, Mason, 7, and Reign, 2, including Pastor Judah and Chelsea Smith’s I Will Follow Jesus Bible Storybook .
